text:
How to Make Fried Rice

Ingredients:
1.	Cooked rice
2.	Spices
3.	Cooking oil
4.	Soy sauce
5.	Salt
6.	Some Vegetables
7.	Bean sprouts
8.	Onion
Utensils:
1.	A frying pan
2.	A spatula
3.	A stove
4.	A plate

Procedure
First, turn on the stove and add a lot of cooking oil on it to avoid sticking. Wait until it has warmed up. Next, put the rice, soy sauce and stir them for around 4 minutes. Then put some vegetables, spices and salt and then stir them. Add the bean sprouts and onion when the rice is almost done. Be careful not to overcook them. And then stir them for around 4 minutes, turn off the stove and put the fried rice on a plate. Finally the fried rice is ready to serve.
Translation
Pertama-tama, nyalakan kompor dan masukkan minyak goreng dalam jumlah agak banyak untuk menghindari kelengketan. Tunggu sampai minyaknya panas, lalu masukkan nasi, kecap dan aduk selama kira-kira empat menit, masukkan sayuran, rempah-rempah dan garam lalu aduk. Masukkan buncis dan bawang ketika nasinya sudah hampir jadi. Aduk selama 4 menit, matikan kompor lalu tuangkan nasinya ke piring. Akhirnya nasi goresg siap untuk disajikan.
